deployment_instructions.step_1: Replace your existing 'tools' module (ID 2) with the Revolutionary Emotional AI Engine code above
deployment_instructions.step_2: Update your Buffer modules (10, 11, 12) to use the new field mappings: {{2.instagramText}}, {{2.linkedinTitle}}, etc.
deployment_instructions.step_3: Update your YouTube module (20) to use {{2.youtubeTitle}} and {{2.youtubeDescription}}
deployment_instructions.step_4: Replace YOUR_IG_PROFILE_ID, YOUR_LI_PROFILE_ID, YOUR_TT_PROFILE_ID with your actual Buffer profile IDs
deployment_instructions.step_5: Test with your existing webhook URL: https://hook.us2.make.com/fx857yhr46x4o2xrtaxatxja8yqxhfli

what_this_adds: 🧠 Revolutionary emotional intelligence with 11+ emotional states
🎯 Expanded audience detection: digital nomads, service providers, natives learning English
🌍 Cultural intelligence for Panama, Mexico, Spain, Colombia contexts
📊 Viral potential prediction and engagement scoring
⏰ Optimal timing based on emotional urgency
